column1: NGR is from the 1950s record sheet. The gauge moved NE in 1921 but the not sure how far, the altitude change was small 1500 to 1470
The gaps in the records are for bracketed readings that have been removed along with the respective annual total
1945 total is bracketed but none of the monthly readings are and the total equals the sum of the monthly readings. Annual total left in the record

1921 total is bracketed but none of the monthly records are and the total matches the sum of the monthly readings. The total may be in brackets because the gauge moved in September of that year. Annual total left in the record
